sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.DeleteSemaphoreSetAjax</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>true</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>DeleteSemaphoreSetAjax</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var DeleteSemaphoreSetAjax = Class.create();
DeleteSemaphoreSetAjax.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
	
	deleteSemaphoreSet: function() {
		if (!gs.hasRole("maint")) {
			gs.addErrorMessage(gs.getMessage("Access denied to delete Semaphore Set"));
			return;
		}
		
		var semSetId = this.getParameter('sysparm_sem_set_id');
		var gr = new GlideRecord("sys_semaphore_set");
		gr.addQuery("semaphore_set_id", semSetId);
		gr.deleteMultiple();
		gs.addInfoMessage(gs.getMessage("Successfully removed semaphore set with ID {0}. Please refresh list to view updated records.", semSetId));
		return true;
	},
	
    type: 'DeleteSemaphoreSetAjax'
});]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2020-09-01 06:19:36</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>2f4c9160770f5010bf05d4082b1061a1</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>14</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>DeleteSemaphoreSetAjax</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Semaphore Management" source="com.glide.semaphore">aecc34836d2220100acb70b3534330d1</sys_package>
        <sys_policy>read</sys_policy>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_2f4c9160770f5010bf05d4082b1061a1</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>maint</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2020-12-03 18:42:16</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>665</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
